name: Risk Analyst/Data Scientist
description:
VIA SMS Group is an alternative financial services provider operating across the Europe and Asia-Pacific. Since the company launch, it has expanded its operations to 10 countries and has grown into a versatile fintech enterprise offering simple and accessible financial solutions under various brand names. Company headquarters are located in Riga, Latvia.

We are currently looking for a data magician to join our friendly team and fill the position of Risk Analyst/Data Scientist within the Risk Management Department for a work remotely.

A bit about you:

  • You love working with data: mining insights and creating models
  • You have practical experience in working with SQL and R and/or Python programming languages
  • You speak English fluently
  • Maintaining a high level of accuracy is a no-brainer for you, and you readily take responsibility
  • Nothing can stop you from seeking continuous improvement
  • Practical experience with Git and Docker would be considered as an advantage

What you will do:

  • Improve and maintain Credit scoring models, analyze their performance and business impact
  • Analyze the company's big data, run experiments, create ad hoc studies, generate proposals to improve operational efficiency
  • Become responsible for credit decisions in one of the geographies

We offer:

  • Dynamic and interesting work in progressive international fintech company
  • Competitive remuneration for the right talent (depending on experience and competencies)
  • Informal, people-oriented culture
  • Various opportunities to engage in company's social life
  • Opportunities for personal and professional growth

Drop us your CV!
